citation.case_name: North Carolina v. Ballard and North Carolina v. Bates

html:
510 U.S. 984

North Carolina
v.
Ballard; and
North Carolina
v.
Bates.

No. 93-143.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 15, 1993.

1

Appeal from the Sup. Ct. N. C.

2

Motions of respondents Lonnie Ballard and Joseph Earl Bates for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 333 N. C. 515, 428 S. E. 2d 178 (first case); 333 N. C. 523, 428 S. E. 2d 693 (second case).
